mutation {
	createDataset(
		input: {
            dataproductID: "{{ .dataproduct_id }}"
			name: "NewDataset"
			description: "New description"
			repo: "somerepo"
			pii: false
			keywords: ["keyword1", "otherkeyword"]
			bigquery: { projectID: "team-prod-4242", dataset: "dataset1", table: "table1" }
		}
	) {
		id
        dataproductID
		name
		description
		repo
		pii
		keywords
	}
}

RETURNS

OPTION data.createDataset.id=IGNORE

ENDOPTS
{
  "data": {
    "createDataset": {
      "dataproductID": "{{ .dataproduct_id }}",
      "name": "NewDataset",
      "description": "New description",
      "keywords": [
        "keyword1",
        "otherkeyword"
      ],
      "pii": false,
      "repo": "somerepo"
    }
  }
}

STORE dataset_id=data.createDataset.id
